email_text.subject: Deposit Notification
email_text.body:
Congratulations on the acceptance of your submission, "{$articleTitle}", for publication in {$journalName}. If you choose, you may automatically deposit your submission in one or more repositories.
Go to {$swordDepositUrl} to proceed.
This email was generated by Open Journal Systems' SWORD deposit plugin.
email_text.description: This email template is used to notify an author of optional deposit points for SWORD deposits.
